website_summaries.verdict: Features a water-based formula that works especially effectively for tough-to-style hair.
pros: Pleasing vanilla scent that matches classic pomade scents
Large size jar that should last you a long time
When you have a style in mind that’s tough to create, this formula is the right choice
Those with coarse and curly hair will appreciate this product’s ability to hold the style in place through the entire day
cons: Doesn’t work as well with fine hair

customer_reviews.title: ... because I have wavy and coarse hair that I like to slick back in a pompadour style
customer_reviews.text: For years I used Gatsby because I have wavy and coarse hair that I like to slick back in a pompadour style. Gatsby works great with exception to one caveat: it’s hard to wash off. I would have to shampoo 2 or 3 times to completely remove the hair product. Now this is where Layrite comes in. Layrite is water soluble so you only have to wash once. And the hold, while not being nearly as strong and Gatsby, suffices quite nicely. One bottle is lasting me the equivalent of two Gatsby containers. Well worth the price and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Master James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If it's not styled with Layrite, it's just not done right.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Great for a water-based pomade.
customer_reviews.text: As far as water-based pomades go, this one is great. Unfortunately, the only ones that seem to hold up all day for me are the oil-based pomades. If your hair gets wet from rain or sweat, you'll have to apply more to re-style it. The only drawback for me is the strong smell. It has a good smell (vanilla) but I don't like smelling my pomade all day. It doesn't seem to fade away as the day goes on. For water-based, I'd definitely recommend Layrite Super Hold or Uppercut Deluxe.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Martin

customer_reviews.title: It will make you a 10
customer_reviews.text: My mom usual says there is nothing in this world that can make me look good until now. I bought this product a little while ago after reading the reviews and tried it on my own hair. Let me tell you, i know believe in miracles because my popularity has risen 10 fold because of this stuff. I went from sham to wow over applying this to my hair, and the best part is, its got a quality scent and strong hold throughout the day, the only down fall is i now have a child on the way so now life is all down hill.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bridgeman

customer_reviews.title: This is my wife’s favorite product for my hair had 70 years old
customer_reviews.text: I have tried over five different hair balms. Unquestionably this is the best product that I have ever tried and is for me perfect for my curly hair that keeps my hair for days looking well kept and gets me the most compliments. I have purchased through Amazon over 20 different hair products and to this day I keep going back and use this after every shower. Fortunately I have a full head of curly hair. This product keeps the frizziness away from my salt and pepper here.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Nightengale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hold
customer_reviews.text: This is such a natural look and feel for male hair, I LOVE it. I think the more natural aspect to it really makes it more appealing to use these days. The scent is killer and is not off putting and chemical isn like so many other name brands. The hold is amazing, it isn't aggressive like helmet hair but it obviously shows you put effort into doing your hair and not being a slob. It washes out easily and will loosen hold if you just run your hands through your hair once or twice. This is my husbands new favorite brand and I always have to buy two so he doesn't run out!
customer_reviews.author: Dido

customer_reviews.title: Layrite is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a year so not nearly as long as others but MAN do I love it. It’s really the best product for my hair I’ve ever tried and I’ve tried quite a few. The smell is the absolute best because it’s not overpowering but it still smells great. The fact that it’s water-based and can just rinse out with water and leave my hair all good and not gross is awesome. I recommend this to everyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Bell

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has truly been the best hair product I have been able to find at this point. It holds all day long and smells wonderful. It doesn't require a ton of product to have a good hold. I want to give a try to all the other kinds of layrite hair products there are. I definitely recommend this for people who have thick, stubborn hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This will be my go-to pomade going forward. Had ...
customer_reviews.text: This will be my go-to pomade going forward. Had been using Suavacito for a while, but kept having incredibly itchy scalp. No issues after switching to this brand and it also seems to wash out easier.
customer_reviews.author: WrathOfGod

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t seen this brand in my local barbershop, I really wanted it to be better than it is. It overall has a reasonable hold, but not nearly the super hole that it lists in its label. I found it to be something that worked for a little while, but overtime didn’t seem to have the lasting power. The scent is reasonably good, kind of an old barbershop feel, and the product itself washes out of your hair easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold but not super strong. Good smell.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and tried almost every hair product marketed to men and this is one of the better ones. It isn't THAT strong a hold, but its on the stronger end of the spectrum. It does not hold as long as some other products, so you will need to "touch up" the hair later in the day. Smell is pleasant. Its on the more expensive side but so far I plan on buying again when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: pointman

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement to Suavecito just because I wanted to try something new. I have thick curly hair and Suavecito usually gets the job done. However this does not offer enough hold at all. I can’t even get my hair to hold even 5 mins after after applying it, the smell isn’t good either. While it isn’t bad, it has a medicinal smell that I can’t imagine anyone complementing. For $20, and the “performance” it offers, I cannot give it anymore than 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Franco Moran

customer_reviews.title: Migraine-in-a-jar
customer_reviews.text: This has an incredibly strong (to me) perfume type of scent, and it lingers for hours. The second time I used it I had to wash my hair 10 minutes later, I just couldn't take it. Aside from the smell it doesn't provide much hold at all (my hair is very thick and this just isn't enough). If you love a strongly fragranced product you'll probably love this, but I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product ever
customer_reviews.text: This has been the only product I've ever found that consistently controls my unruly hair. I'm able to style it the way I want every time. It's not that expensive, doesn't cause any scalp problems, is easy to use, holds like hell, smells good, and easily washes out. Its literally perfect. I'll seriously probably be using this stuff for the rest of my life if I can.
customer_reviews.author: HighSierras13

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Hold
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t hold at all. I used a trash ton of this stuff on my hair and it just wouldn’t hold. The minimal hold it kept completely faded the second i stepped outside for less than 2 minutes because a tiny amount of sweat makes it all loose. My hair is pretty fine too, its not curly and is a medium short length. Its not horrible, but I do think it could be way better especially for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend Uses it Daily for Years - Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend uses it every day to get ready for work. We have repurchased this product a lot, it's tried and true. Scent is great. The only gripe I ever hear is that if he uses it, he has to do his entire style. He says it is hard to do more casual styles or just touch up certain spots. It looks like hair gel when it is in the hair, darker and slightly greasy look.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Huff

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than the original
customer_reviews.text: First was introduced to Layrite by my barber shop, and original works really well on a fresh haircut. After it starts growing out, I need a stronger hold and this has it. Sure, it is not as inexpensive as other offerings on here, but for thick hair that tends to curl at the ends when growing out, this does the job. Washes out pretty fast, and a classic vanilla soda scent.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: This product does not superhold anything!
customer_reviews.text: I've given the superhold pomade two tries and it is one of the most frustrating products I've ever used. I'm a male with medium long hair something like Bradley Cooper and this product literally does nothing. I've tried using a lot, a little, combining it with a pre styler, blow drying, etc. This product literally does nothing to hold my hair in place. This may work for short hair like a fade or something but this product SUCKS for long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried but won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of hair products out Layrite is great but not worth the money. So far, I'm way happier with Suavecito firm hold. Great value for the money and holds much better. If I can save anyone time and money, then this review is worth writing.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: Strongest handlebar mustache “wax” that isn’t a wax.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only stuff I can find to keep my handlebar mustache in place. It keeps the curl, smells good (very light smell) and holds all day. In fact most days I don’t wash it out and just add to it. Very easy to wash out with water. I have tried many many products and this is the only one that works. It holds and depending on the weather/humidity it will harden but still be a little pliable for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Smells Good Too!
customer_reviews.text: People love the smell of this product. I don't wear anything else that is scented yet people compliment me on how good I smell... I tell them it's just the hair gel. Regardless, it's the best. Great hold, the jar lasts a good long time and it is easy to simply wash out. It's the only stuff I use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Opey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your quarantine flow
customer_reviews.text: Like many, my hair is longer than it's ever been. At first I couldn't get a haircut. Then I was like, "dang, I still have my hair, maybe I like letting it grow a bit." Enter Layrite super hold pomade. I get to have my long flowing locks on the weekends, while getting things in order M - F. Smells good, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Baroo

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that can make my super straight hair stay up and back in a pompadore ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that can make my super straight hair stay up and back in a pompadore and it stays all day. Hair doesn't get hard or crunchy and I can still run my fingers through it. People ask me all the time what product I use....buy this and hit it with some Living Proof Control Hairspray
customer_reviews.author: Brandon McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Five stars in all categories!
customer_reviews.text: Very easily washed out with water and holds very firm when applied. It leaves just the right amount of shine; more natural oil shine as opposed to a glossy gel look. No crunching when touched and styles very easily with a comb. What else could you want from a pomade. I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRICE FOR THE BEST HAIR PRODUCT OF ALL TOME
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this is it is amazing. It is BY FAR my ALL TIME favorite hair product that I've everever used!! I've purchased other brands that were WAY more expensive but this is by far the best I've ever used. After applying to my hair it is extremely easy to rinse off of my hands. And at the end of the day my hair is pretty much in the same shape as before when I put it on.....AND then to remove it from my hair takes only seconds with water. I really hope the manufacturer never realizes how amazing this is because they could easily charge double of what they do now.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Eng

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm a avid hair product user. And this is the best there is with my thick curly hair. I use it for slick backs and pompadours. Highly recommend this. Nice vanilla smell. Ladies always give many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great for costumes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my version of “punk 11” from Stranger Things. Kept my short hair pulled back, even though I used more than the recommended. Really had to warm it up, but with the help of a couple of Bobby pins, was the perfect look! I like that the scent isn’t strong or unflattering. Gives the hair a slight shine, but nothing like you just greased a bowling ball.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: You want the best? Here it is
customer_reviews.text: Usually I use Suavecito firme and have no complaints but I thought I would try Laurier superhold. It’s a game changer!! I have thick, wavy Asian hair and this stuff straightened out my hardest waves and holds it where I comb it, does not get crusty or uncomfortable hard. Smells like vanilla cream soda but isn’t overpowering. A little goes along way and it holds all day and can be reformed without pulling hair out!!! Washes out of my hair with room temp water!!! This is my new and only go to. Sorry Suavecito you guys are awesome but layrite took amazing and created perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chrisb

customer_reviews.title: My husband uses this over and over
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves it. I use it on my son's hair when I want to style his hair. A little goes a long way. Smells good, washes off hands well, lasts on the hair all day. Like I said, my hubs orders this over and over and uses the product until the product is GONE.
customer_reviews.author: SMyle

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Layrite for several years for a classic zero fade w/ side part style. Holds well and can be reshaped next day if you leave it in. Smell is very pleasant. You can use a little water to adjust strength and consistency. One heads up: if you have very short hair (less than 1.5") it may not keep your hair down or in place without a very thick application.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my short pixie haircut! I’m not a huge fan of the smell but it’s rather mild and doesn’t stick around for long. The hold does stick around, however; very easy to style and you barely need to use any at all. My partner and I both style our hair at least once a day with this product, but one 4oz. container lasts months!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mae

customer_reviews.title: the best pomade I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best pomade I've ever used. It Has excellent hold for my thick Spanish wavy kind of curly hair . Excellent hold for those who want to achieve the slickback hairstyle...The only drawback I have for this pomade is the scent, it smells like vanilla. I'm not a big fan of Vanilly scent which I can smell it on my hair throughout the day.... despite the scent, it's the best pomade hold out there in the market.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but too pricey and becomes non-usable after awhile
customer_reviews.text: I've used Layrite for a few years now and I thought it was the best on the market but there are other products that are just as good, cheaper and does not get gummy w/ 25% of the product left and becomes unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy S

customer_reviews.title: Great gel, heard about it through you tube
customer_reviews.text: Great gel, heard about it through you tube, wanted a sleek back hair style that looked and stayed in place, giving a sophisticated, simple, classic look. Highly recommend it, it's for men and women.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Best texture
customer_reviews.text: Been using the product for 14+ years. Easily my favorite. I like the smell, though I’ve heard some criticisms. The texture and weight is for sure the thing that keeps me coming back. The price feels a little steep, but worth it, goes quite a ways if you use it right (not too much daily) Similar to suavecito if that’s your jam.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Bess

customer_reviews.title: The BEST for short hair
customer_reviews.text: I’m a short haired woman. If that doesn’t say enough just know that hair is everything when you a a woman with short hair. For years I have searched for the perfect product to hold my thick, full head of hair in place while also not feeling like it will never wash out. This stuff is THE BEST. It holds like a traditional wax, but washes out like a gel. I wish I could still find the 32 ounce tubs. This is how much I love this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Greta Shirdon

customer_reviews.title: Cruisin' Hair Styling
customer_reviews.text: This Pomade gives a strong, defined hold either for curly hair or pushed up hair. Put a dab on your fingers, wet that and run your fingers thru the hair several times. It dries in 3 to 4 minutes. I reapply to punk up the front, but it's your choice. (2 months later: I'm enjoying this more & more).
customer_reviews.author: Richard Robins

customer_reviews.title: Works great for short, curly hair
customer_reviews.text: As title says. I don't need much of it (maybe two finger tips worth of the stuff for all my hair) and it work like a charm. My hair is fine and curly if that helps. Holds good, but without too much of that super shiny look. Really easy to wash off too. Smells fine and doesn't make flakes in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good product if shipped right
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend buying in store. Last couple times I’ve ordered top wasn’t securely on and pomade was on outside of can. The product itself is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Was reluctant initially but I am glad I decided to give Layrite Firm a try
customer_reviews.text: Have been trying suvecito firme hold for a while now. So thought of trying something else. Was reluctant initially but I am glad I decided to give Layrite Firm a try. It smells much better and doesnt dry your hair as fast as suavecito does. The packaging is nicer as well. Gives your hair a better shine and overall look.
customer_reviews.author: drcuddles

customer_reviews.title: It's hold incredibly, washes out easy, and doesn't stay stuck to fingers
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, hands down my favorite hair product for thick hair. It survives heavy gym sessions with my hair perfectly in place, 16 hours days of activity, and even a 500mile trip plus a fencing tournament. If your hair somehow gets out of place, you can just restyle it and it'll effectively continue to hold. Also smells pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail

customer_reviews.title: Stiff hold with out white flaky build up
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman with coarse hair and I'm greying, need I say more. My hair is hard to control. Desperate trying to find a product that held my hair in place, without stiff, flaky build up. I thought of the person that had the best kept hair I know. I raided his hair products testing one at a time. Found this one to be my new secret weapon. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Uribe

customer_reviews.title: BEST pomade
customer_reviews.text: BEST pomade ever. Forget Suavecito-Layrite works 10x better. Been using it for several years and glad it’s on Amazon. Easier to find!
customer_reviews.author: BTK

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Great results.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried MANY different hair products. Was, pomade, gels, etc. Every time I come back to this. Hold all day every time. Easy to work with and apply. Control the “stiffness” look with how wet your hair is. More wet = more stiff (heyohhh). Bottom line: Great product. Consistent. Good amount for price.
customer_reviews.author: David Nitzsche

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, overall
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, overall. Solid hold without any shine whatsoever. Keeps hair looking completely natural. Washes out easily. Don't buy in that it's a substitute for wax, though, as the marketing would have you believe. It's not nearly as strong as wax.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.text: I've been using pomade for years. This is definitely one of the better ones without spending a lot of money. there is a kind of art per say I guess is what you can call it to pomading your hair without it looking greasy, feeling crunchy or it coming apart. This one holds up really well after a full day and working out at the end it still holds well up until the very end when my cardio sweat takes over. The scent is good, it kind of reminds of a vanilla, but I have had better that have smelled better.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Ray

customer_reviews.title: Probably good for other hair types, but not for thick, coarse hair.
customer_reviews.text: Does not really provide a "super hold". I have coarse thick hair, and Layrite only seems to hold for about an hour. This is also provides more of matte, dull finish. I thought it would add a little more shine. Overall, this probably good for other hair types, but not mine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My choice for Hair Pomade/gel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pomade. It gives a strong hold, but washes out well. Typically I will put this in my hair and blow dry it to shape. I then hit it with a little hair spray. My hair stays in place all day, even after the gym. This is nice and matte so it doesnt look like I have product in my hair. I have been using this for about 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant handle the curl
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, works ok, doesnt hold all day though and doesnt hold strong enough for my curls. I prefer Jovino if you are willing to buck up, it holds much better and is all natural. Reuzel has better hold too IMO as long as you dont apply it to too wet of hair and is around the same price point as Layrite.
customer_reviews.author: Hockey19

customer_reviews.title: Returned Product
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking this product was going to be a clay pomade, but turned out to be a gel and I didn't enjoy the experience of putting in my hair. Returned product and will not reorder. Continuing to use my American Crew Fiber and loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Braveheart812

customer_reviews.title: Best holding pomade to date that I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried probably 6-10 different pomades throughout the years. I read all the reviews on this and decided i would give it a shot myself. Well, I was very impressed. I have dense medium thickness hair, that if left unkempt is very wavy. This product held up through a full night of work and still has a good firm hold. A little product went farther than expected. This is likely the last pomade I'll purchase for a long time. I will be looking into other products from Layrite.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R.

customer_reviews.title: Great pomade - note that it contains silicones
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pomade, especially since I could use it on dry hair. However, note that it contains silicones, so if you're doing a silicone-free method or the curly girl method, this may not be the best product for you.
customer_reviews.author: groovy

customer_reviews.title: Hands down my favorite pomade ever
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite pomade ever. Use on straight hair or really tough to handle wavy hair and you got yourself a nice pomade that will mold your hair into the style you absolutely love. It will last quite a long time, smell fantastic, and a quick to fix. Just lightly run your hands under water and run them through your hair to readjust. Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Legen Darry

customer_reviews.title: Good value and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Good pomade. Easy to work into hair. Washes out easily. Pleasant, light, scent. Large quantity needed for medium to long hair. Lasts about 5 hours before drier appearance.
customer_reviews.author: KEB

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have the Layrite clay but I decided to try this super hold pomade . I'm so glad I did because it gives my hair control but it does not make my hair hard like gel does. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sal L

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hair stuff, it has lots of hold to it and is much better & cheaper than American crew. It’s got a good shine and lots of fiber so it’s kinda the best of both worlds; it also washed out easy.
customer_reviews.author: Young CPA

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Its a little pricy but does what I need it to do. Strong hold. You can basically decide how matt or shiny of a look you want depending on how damp you hair is.
customer_reviews.author: S.F. Hirmiz

customer_reviews.title: It's waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is not "SUPER HOLD". It's waste of money. There are other less expensive products that do the same thing. My search continues for a product with a better hold..
customer_reviews.author: Mr.A

customer_reviews.title: Great hold, sweet vanilla scent, washes out easily
customer_reviews.text: Holds extremely well. Husband has used this for almost 5 years now and won’t use any other brand. Washes out well. He loves the sweet (vanilla-like scent). I don’t really prefer it, but it washes out easily, and I just use a different hair brush so my hair doesn’t smell like it. He has short hair and one container lasts him about one year.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Prokopiev

customer_reviews.title: Best on market for taming hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Pacino's Matte, Suavecito, American Crew, and others. This is the only one that works everytime!! I have lots of thin-ish hair that has a mind of its own and with any other product will visibly fight back against what I want my hair to look like. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: i buy stuff sometimes

customer_reviews.title: Lid came off during shipping
customer_reviews.text: The lid was off completely. The paper under the metal lid came off. You would think after several reviews of the same issue, you guys would fix it. Scraped off the half inch of hard and crud stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is consistent. Every time I've purchased and used this product, the results have been the same. Smells pretty good and helps keep my hair in place. I do need to supplement with hairspray when my hair gets a bit longer than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: The best product I've ever used for styling my handlebar mustache.
customer_reviews.text: O have a handlebar mustache and have tried every product imaginable to shape it. This product was the absolute best for my stash. The secret is, don't be stingy when applying.
customer_reviews.author: JKisha

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. I have extremely thick hair and holds ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I have extremely thick hair and holds everything in place. Fairly versatile in that you can give it a messy look or can slick it back. Able to restyle it multiple times throughout the day without the need for new application, just use a blow dryer to unlock pliability.
customer_reviews.author: mgarci12

customer_reviews.title: Washes Out Well
customer_reviews.text: The hold is rather strong which I need for my thick, wavy hair. This hair type tends to hold onto product, but this one washes out easily as well as off your hands after styling. For these reasons, it has become my daily use product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremie Leverich

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold for thick wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is about 6 inches long, thick, and wavy. I work in a professional environment and I need to keep my hair under control. Layrite Superhold does the job! It's really sticky and more like a gel - it dries hard with a high hold and medium shine. Shinier and stronger than my old favorite, their Cement Clay. It smells pleasant and mild. It's easy to wash out at the end of the day. It lasts a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett Killey

customer_reviews.title: One Pomade to Rule Them All
customer_reviews.text: Stop your search, this is the best pomade you could ask for. It's very easy to apply, holds all day long and then washes out in a breeze. This is a great value for the money, I've found this works better than most other pomades while being cheaper. It also smells amazing too, a very subtle vanilla scent. Whenever my wife smells it she says she's reminded of a waffle cone, I don't get that but it smells great anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Omar A

customer_reviews.title: You Gotta Try This One
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing to complain about this pomade. I’ve been buying for 4 months now, washes off with water easily, and holds your hair very sturdy like no other. A friend recommended this hair product and ever since then I keep buying more. I will definitely do the same and recommend this product to my friends and peers.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Stays on all day long, washes off easily in the shower. You can use a lot to get a nice hard matte gel look or use a little on dry hair and get soft hold!
customer_reviews.author: THE AVG PRO

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Not too shinny not too dull
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with the look it gives my hair. Super long lasting, I work manual labor and I sweat a lot doing my job but at the end of the day my hair is still exceptionally in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Loud dog

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold, great smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this product. It spreads easy in the hands and applies well. Smells great too! The hold is just as good as the Suavecito Firme Hold, which I also like. Washes out very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Multiple ways to style makes this my go to
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! I use it out of the shower for a more slicked back look, but if I want to go casual later, I just mess it up and it's a firm matte. Lighter than a wax and rinses out with just water. My hair is 4" - 5" long and one "tin" lasts me about 8 to 10 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: What can I say that hasn’t already been said? This stuff is THE BEST. Light scent that doesn’t overwhelm, great hold, not too much shine, washes out like a breeze at the end of the day. This is how every pomade should be made, but few are. I have tried close to 20 different pomades, and this makes the top of the list, no contest. Those good reviews are here for a reason!
customer_reviews.author: Alex George

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff to tame the mane
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of Pomades and this is the best for taming my nasty cowlick. Don’t accidentally leave the lid off or this stuff gets a really tacky consistency. I’ve bought several bottles
customer_reviews.author: D-Will

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing! It comes out with water! It lasts for a long time (and I have a lot of hair)! It’s better than expected. It holds strong, but keeps my hair pliable. Any bad review is going to be a personal problem because this is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Garret

customer_reviews.title: Great hold and smell
customer_reviews.text: Switched from American Crew's pomade and it took a little getting used to. Once I figured out how much I need for my hair, I haven't looked back and never will. It holds all day, even in humid weather
customer_reviews.author: Kushal Bakshi

customer_reviews.title: Good For Long Beards
customer_reviews.text: Really good stuff fo a long beard. Easy rinse from hands. Strong hold. Make sure product has set and you are good to fo for hours. Only con is cost.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Good product but tinted.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Super hold for 5 years now to groom my handlebar Stache. It works well and is easy to use and wash out. My only complaint is that ir has an orange tint that lightly colors my gray mustache. Wish they had non tinted for that reason. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best of the best
customer_reviews.text: What can I say lay rite is the best, perfect pomp everytime. Easy to use and easy to wash out. Perfect hold, no helmet head and at the end of the day wet your hands and pat your hair till it’s perfect again. There is cheaper and more expensive stuff out there but lay rite is worth every cent. One jar lasts a long time since you don’t have to use as much as the other brands. It doesn’t get much better then this!
customer_reviews.author: Michael V. Gorena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my type of hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. This product is the only product that can tame my hair. I have thick hair and it's very hard to style it with any gel. Layrite allows me to shape it the way I want it. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: iBuyStuff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent control
customer_reviews.text: Layrite products are always high end and effective, I have wavy hair and this always gives me the shape and hold that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V

customer_reviews.title: Great Pomade
customer_reviews.text: Husband started using this for his hair now that he’s grown it out and absolutely loves it. He has a naturally curly head and this pomade holds well. Also doesn’t have a obnoxious scent to it and washes out easy.
customer_reviews.author: Liane McGuigan

customer_reviews.title: Scent is too much for me
customer_reviews.text: The hold is good but the scent is too much for me. Too much of a sweet vanilla scent. Even a small amount still smells just as much as a larger amount. If you can get over the vanilla then it holds good throughout the day. Imperial is my primary this is now my backup.
customer_reviews.author: rex0r

customer_reviews.title: Holds great and last all day
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second jar as this works really well for my coarse hair. Washes out easily and smells decent. I do too it off with some hair spray. No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: StevO

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I apply it after being out of the shower for about 5 mins, hair slightly damp. Holds well and looks good. Nothing else comes close.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: I do like the new design on the container
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Layrite Superhold for quite some time now and it is a high quality product that works very well for me. I do like the new design on the container. It makes it look crisp and clean which is exactly something that you get out of this product; a clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Kcorb

customer_reviews.title: Not as super holding as its name claims
customer_reviews.text: This one is super thin and isn’t a super hold at all. For more manageable stronger hold I would suggest you use Larite Cement Clay topped with a strong hairspray
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Durston

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is like the 3rd container I have ordered for my husband over the past few years.. He loves it. You only need a tiny bit to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Marjan Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Very gummy, but doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: I'd have to take this to work in order to get a longterm hold. It stops holding after just a few hours and my hair goes everywhere. Probably fine for people with less/thinner hair. But if you're looking for a product with a serious hold, go for the clay with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hastie

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use works well and smells good
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. Last a long time. I have thick hair and this held it in place and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best pomade out there!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using Layrite for the past 3.5 years. He likes the consistency and the hold that the pomade provides. The pomade is not too thick and does not flake when make adjustments to your hair. The smell isn't overpowering. The can last about 1.5 months for him. He would recommend this to others to use!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Have to use a lot of it and the hold still isn't good.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyBoom

customer_reviews.title: Must get!
customer_reviews.text: My Boyfriend just loves this!! He was running out so I had to order more? Keeps his hair in place and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great hold, easy to wash out, nice smell
customer_reviews.text: I have searched for awhile for a pomade that would hold my hair through dance classes/musical theatre productions, under hot lights with lots of movement, that was also easy to wash out. This works perclfectly while dancing and singing and sweating (too much sweat will cause it to begin to fall) and it comes out simply with water in the shower
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pomade
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Easy to use, dries hard but not stiff. Easy to wash out and gives a semi gloss look.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It really holds my fly-away Hair in place without looking greasy or stiff. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Judy P.

customer_reviews.title: Holds hair very well!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It doesn't smell as manly as the Suavecito product, but it holds my hair shape slightly better. In addition it leaves a little shine which is not too overbearing like I just took a shower. I think I'm switching.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Reyes

customer_reviews.title: The Only Pomade For Me
customer_reviews.text: I use superhold every day and have for the last 4 years. This stuff keeps my hair where I want it and washes out instantly being water-based.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the best hair products out there for men!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has tried at least 20 different hair products and this is by far is favorite. Price is a little high but that doesn't stop him from having me order them every month.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Conte

customer_reviews.title: Best hold for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great hold easy to wash off and has a non offensive scent. Does the damn job and does it well!
customer_reviews.author: Clayton L.

product_meta.title: Layrite Superhold Pomade, 4.25 oz
product_meta.description:
An incredible high hold, water-based pomade that gives ultimate control and superb hold for the most demanding and challenging styles. Distributes easily--Even in thick, coarse curly hair. Grips hair to shape into even the highest elevation styles. Manages and helps straighten curl. Dries with a flexible hold to keep hair in place all day. Never flakes. Signature mild cream soda scent. Smooth the hair by going deep within the surface of the hair shaft to lock in moisture, providing luster and shine while taming frizz. Naturally-Derived from Coconut Oil and Castor Oil

BRAND STORY
Originally developed For Barbers By Barbers, Layrite delivers versatile, high performance men’s grooming products that consistently exceed expectations, so that you can go off and exceed your own.
